lyrics:
5 contributorsbrothers of the highway lyricsverse 1
diamonds on the windshield
as heaven starts to cry
in his rearview mirror
his angel waves goodbye

prechorus
she knows hes got to go
she knows hes one of them

chorus
brothers of the highway children of the wind
that detroit diesel pirate ship goes blowing out again
sailing towards that setting sun freedoms their best friend
brothers of the highway children of the wind

verse 2
he puts the pedal to the metal
trying to outrun the rain
another shot of truck stop coffee
goes running through his veins

prechorus 2
this world turns on eighteen wheels
thank god we can depend on
see george strait liveget tickets as low as 102you might also likechorus
brothers of the highway children of the wind
that detroit diesel pirate ship goes blowing out again
sailing towards that setting sun freedoms their best friend
brothers of the highway children of the wind

bridge
carolina west to denver baton rouge east to pittsburgh
portland south to san diego sail on sail on
tallahassee north to boston up to bangor west to austin
coast to coast sea to sea sail on sail on

chorus
you brothers of the highway children of the wind
that detroit diesel pirate ship goes blowing out again
sailing towards that setting sun freedoms their best friend
brothers of the highway children of the wind

outro
god bless you brothers of the highway children of the wind1embed
